title: thunderbird mobile: import secret key - decrypt w/ NFC smartcard gives "intitialization failed"
creator: gerrit.leder
content:
Hello all,

thank you for thunderbird! I have a fully functional thunderbird desktop installation w/ gpg smartcard support.

When I want to decrypt the same encrypted eMail on thunderbird mobile I get an "initialization failed" while presenting the NFC smartcard to the mobile phone.

What am I missing?

Thanks in advance!

Best regards Gerrit

title: Thunderbird for Android Unified Inbox Emails disappear when read
creator: gcald4
content: This just started happening a few days ago, once I click into an email in the unified inbox it disappears from the inbox. Prior to that the email would remain in the unified inbox showing as read. Now the email will still be in the individual email address inbox, just not in the unified inbox. How do I change this back? I'm running three email addresses through thunderbird.
